mapper.insert: insert into t_own_driver (user_id, driver_ID, affiliated_company, driver_name, driver_phone, driver_category, driver_email, driver_sex, driver_nationality, driver_birthday, driver_license, driver_province, driver_city, driver_district, driver_address, driver_remark, create_id, create_name, create_date, update_id, update_name, update_date, is_deleted, company_id ) values (#{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{driverId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{affiliatedCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{driverName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{driverPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{driverCategory,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{driverEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{driverSex,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{driverNationality,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{driverBirthday,jdbcType=DATE}, #{driverLicense,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{driverProvince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{driverCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{driverDistrict,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{driverAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{driverRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT} )

mapper.select: select user_id, driver_ID, affiliated_company, driver_name, driver_phone, driver_category, driver_email, driver_sex, driver_nationality, driver_birthday, driver_license, driver_province, driver_city, driver_district, driver_address, driver_remark, create_id, create_name, create_date, update_id, update_name, update_date, is_deleted, company_id from t_own_driver where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
